titles.title: Peeping Life TV: Season 1??
peeping life tv
Peeping Life TV シーズン1??
Peeping Life TV Season 1??

anime.description: Heroes from worlds of Tezuka Production and Tatsunoko Production "evolved" for their TV appearance. Source: crunchyroll Note: The "slow-life anime" is part of the datsuryoku-kei (ennui-style) genre of comedy that depicts the listless minutiae of everyday life. The original anime combined motion-captured improvised acting with computer animation into a series of comedy shorts.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: unsorted
tag.description: a bunch of tags that still need to be either deleted or moved into proper places.

tag.name: CGI
tag.description: Computer-generated imagery (CGI) or computer animation is the art of creating moving images via the use of computers. It is a subfield of computer graphics and animation. Increasingly it is created by means of 3D computer graphics, though 2D computer graphics are still widely used for stylistic, low bandwidth, and faster real-time rendering needs. Sometimes the target of the animation is the computer itself, but sometimes the target is another medium, such as film.

tag.name: cultural references
tag.description: The plot of this anime shows signs of cultural references, these are often jokes that make reference to a certain custom, habit or history that is specifically attributed to that culture. Knowledge of the culture itself is needed in order to properly understand these jokes.

tag.name: 3D CG animation
tag.description: Abbreviation for "three-dimensional computer generated animation" or "computer graphics" (CGI). The traditional 2D art is enhanced by 3D imagery developed through computer modeling software. Done in the right way, this union of 3D in a 2D animated world can be a very beautiful relationship. The difference lies in what lacks the traditional 2D animation all together and may give term to something produced entirely with 3D graphics (such as the 2006 remake of "Appleseed" , 2007`s "Vexille", the 2008 addition to the "Biohazard" series and the more well known "Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within" and "Advent Children").

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: アイドル追っかけのアクビちゃん / ヒゲおやじとお茶の水博士のおやじトーク / サファイアの裏声練習 / 結婚相談所 コミュ障のマザコン男編
Illana: Idol Groupee / Mr. Mustachio and Dr. Elefun`s Old Geezer Chat / Sapphire`s Falsetto Practice / Matchmaking Center: Mommy`s Boy with Communication Disorders
Idol Okkake no Akubi-chan / Hige Oyaji to Ochanomizu Hakase no Oyaji Talk / Sapphire no Uragoe Renshuu / Kekkonsoudan Tokoro Communication Sawa no Mazakon Otoko Hen
episode.summary: Illana wants Joey to bring a ton of oxygen for a Loose Socks concert. Mr. Mustachio and Dr. Elefun are getting old. Tink thinks Princess Sapphire`s hoarse voice sounds pretty badass. 38-year-old Manabu-kun can hardly find himself, much less a marriage partner. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: コバルト兄さんにも彼女出来た / キャシャーン 嫁姑問題に揺れる / ショータとコータのバレンタイン / バカップル グアムへ行く ホテル到着編
Jetto Gets a Girlfriend / Casshern`s In-Law Woes / Valentine`s Day for Shota and Kohta / Dumb Couple Goes to Guam: At the Hotel
Cobalt Niisan ni mo Kanojo Shuttaita / Casshern Yomeshuutome Mondai ni Yureru / Shouta to Kouta no Valentine / Bakappuru Guam e Iku Hotel Touchaku Hen
episode.summary: Jetto gets a girlfriend. Luna-chan isn’t happy with Casshern’s parents. Kohta and Shota are in for a surprise on Valentine’s Day. The dumbass couple can’t open the door. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ハクション大魔王のカラオケレクチャー / グッバイ・ショッピング(複合コピー機編) / ボヤッキーの部屋 / バカップル グアムへ行く 入国審査編
Bob`s Karaoke Lecture / Good Buy Shopping / Boyacky`s Room / Dumb Couple Goes to Guam: Immigration
Hakushon Daimaou no Karaoke Lecture / Goodbye Shopping (Fukugou Copyki Hen) / Boyacky no Heya / Bakappuru Guam e Iku: Nyuukoku Shinsa Hen
episode.summary: Bob teaches John how to cozy up with a girl at karaoke. Triton of the Sea ruins a live shopping show. Boyacky`s guest, Tink, describes the first time he had fruit punch. The dumbass couple arrives at the Guam airport. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アトムの壁ドン練習 / ドロンジョ様 戦いのその後に / ブラック・ジャック 風邪引いて病院へ / バカップル グアムへ行く 飛行機編
Astro`s Kabedon Exercise / Doronjo After a Battle / Black Jack Visits the Doctor with the Flu / Dumb Couple Goes to Guam: Airplane
Atom no Kabe Don Renshuu / Doronjo-sama Tatakai no Sono Nochini / Black Jack Kaze Hiite Byouin e / Bakappuru Guam e Iku Hikouki Hen
episode.summary: Astro puts a huge hole in the wall. Dronjo goes to Yatterman for bike repairs. Black Jack goes to Dr. Boyacky with the flu. The dumbass couple goes to Guam. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヤッターワン飼い犬になる!? / パワーウインドウ越しの昼 / ナチュラルオーガニック男子 / ボヤッキーの部屋 (ゲスト: ブライキングボス)
Yatterwan Becomes a House Pet?! / Noon Through the Power Windows / Natural Organic Boy / Boyacky`s Room
Yatterwan Kaiinu ni Naru!? / Power Window Goshi no Hiru / Natural Organic Danshi / Bojacky no Heya (Guest: Burai King Boss)
episode.summary: Yatterman wants Yatterwan back. A whipped man upsets his wife and gets locked out of the car. The natural shop gets a lesson on nature. Braiking Boss gives life lessons on Boyacky`s show. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アトムのアフレコ収録 / クイズルネッサンス / クイズルネッサンス / クイズルネッサンス
Astro`s Dubbing / Quiz Renaissance / Quiz Renaissance / Quiz Renaissance
Atom no Afureco Shuuroku / Quiz Renaissance / Quiz Renaissance / Quiz Renaissance
episode.summary: Astro loses interest in his voice-over work. Black Jack, Sapphire and Yatterman 2 are in a drawing quiz show. None of them can draw. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トリトンのダイエット大作戦 / グッバイ・ショッピング(24Kネックレス編) / ZIP!xPLTV 桝アナと小熊アナの雑談 / 結婚相談所 農家の長男編
Operation: Triton`s Diet / Good Buy Shopping / Zip! Peeping Life TV: News Anchor Masu and News Anchor Oguma Chat Session / Matchmaking Center: Farmer`s Firstborn Son
Triton no Diet Daisakusen / Good Buy Shopping (24K Necklace Hen) / ZIP! x PLTV Masu-ana to Oguma-ana no Zatsudan / Kekkon Soudanjo: Nouka no Chounan Hen
episode.summary: Triton hits the treadmill; the treadmill hits back. The Ambassador of Magma becomes the Representative of Bling. News anchor Oguma gets a taste of Boyacky Therapy. The cabbage farmer is hunting for a wife who can work a pickup truck. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キャシャーン健康ランドで再会 / ボヤッキーの部屋(ゲスト: コバルト兄さん) / ZIP!xPLTVボヤッキーの部屋(ゲスト: 桝アナ) / 結婚相談所 現実見えてないOL編
Casshern`s Reunion at the Health Center / Boyacky`s Room / Zip! Peeping Life TV: Boyacky`s Room / Matchmaking Center: Working Woman in Denial
Casshern Kenkou Land de Saikai / Boyacky no Heya (Guest: Cobalt Nii-san) / ZIP! x PLTV Boyacky no Heya (Guest: Masu Announcer) / Kekkonsoudan Tokoro Genjitsu Mietenai OL Hen
episode.summary: Casshern and Braiking Boss have a score to settle in the sauna. Jetto needs clothing advice. Anchorman Masu gets help with his articulation. The thirty-eight-year-old Jennys groupie is looking for a husband. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アトムついにボディチェンジ / ボヤッキーの部屋 (ゲスト: ハッチ) / ライタンとマグマの純情男旅 金閣寺編 / オタクくん 動画配信始めようかと...
Astro Finally Has a Body Change / Boyacky`s Room / Gold Lightan and Ambassador Magma`s Sentimental Journey: Kinkakuji / Otaku-kun Starts Streaming
Atom Tsui ni Body Change / Boyacky no Heya (Guest: Hacchi) / Raitan to Magma no Junjou Otoko Tabi: Kinkakuji Hen / Otaku-kun: Douga Haishin Hajimeyou ka to...
episode.summary: Astro gets a downgrade. Hutch gives a shout out to his mom on Boyacky`s Room. Lightan wants to go for a lighter gold. The nerd`s breathing intensifies. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海のトリトン ビーチで監視中 / グッバイ・ショッピング (ガスバーナー編) / 新婚ちゃん 格安ロボット掃除機を買う / ライタンとマグマの純情男旅 中州編
Triton of the Sea on Guard at the Beach / Good Buy Shopping / Newlyweds Buy a Cheap Cleaning Robot / Gold Lightan and Magma`s Sentimental Journey: Nakasu
Umi no Triton: Beach de Kanshichuu / Good Buy Shopping (Gas Burner Hen) / Shinkon-chan: Kakuyasu Robot Soujiki o Kau / Raitan to Magma no Junjou Otoko Tabi: Nakasu Hen
episode.summary: Triton of the Sea meets Astro, who`s looking for beach babes. Gold Lightan is outdone by silver burners. Magma Ambassador and Gold Lightan discuss ramen. Da Roomda! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 断然, 爆速っす / ケータイ親子 スマホに変える / バックパッカーと新幹線で相席 / ライタンとマグマの純情男旅 金印編
Totally Fast as Hell, Dude / Cell Phone Family: Switching to a Smartphone / On the Bullet Train with a Backpacker / Gold Lightan and Magma`s Sentimental Journey: Gold Stamp
Danzen, Bakusokussu / Keitai Ojako: Smafo ni Kaeru / Backpacker to Shinkansen de Aiseki / Raitan to Magma no Junjou Otoko Tabi: Kin`in Hen
episode.summary: PokeMax is mad fast. Dad`s face doesn`t support multitouch. The backpacking hobo and the corporate swine are incompatible. Stampson the golden stamp wants in on a ramen run. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 大人になっちゃったタッチ / ハッチ デパートで迷子 / ヨガの達人ムトゥさん来日 / グッバイ・ショッピング(美容クリーム編)
Touch, All Grown Up / Hutch the Honeybee, Lost at the Mall / The Master Yogi, Muthu-san, Comes to Japan / Good Buy Shopping
Otona ni Nacchatta Touch / Hutch: Depart de Maigo / Yoga no Tatsujin Mutu-san Raijitsu / Good Buy Shopping (Biyou Cream Hen)
episode.summary: Touch takes blue candy. Hutch gets lost at the mall. Great yogi Muthu is on his 11th, going on 10th day of his fast. Doronjo pitches Biotech Beauty Gel Alpha Beta Nano Thirteen. Source: crunchyroll
